LanguageData.DMS_Mech_BattleFrame.label: Battle Friend
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_BattleFrame.description: Designed as a light infantry fighting unit, the battle friend has a considerable load capacity and ability to use most human equipment.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_BattleFrame.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_EscortLifter.label: Escort Lifter
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_EscortLifter.description: An early stage mass-production automatroid. Its no longer in regular service but there're still plenty of them modified for transport purposes.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_EscortLifter.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_FieldCommand.label: Field Command
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_FieldCommand.description: A battle friend subvariant. It functions as a mechanitor command relay, however due to the weight of the relay equipment it can only use a light weapon.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_FieldCommand.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_ShaftWorker.label: Shaft Worker
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_ShaftWorker.description: An early stage mass-produced automatroid. Its no longer in regular service but there're still lots of them modified to used for mining and construct purpose.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_ShaftWorker.tools.head.label: head
